discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
If the map is not recent, you may face unexpected surprises: wrong scale or wrong dimensions for some rooms, repurposed areas in which layout is now different from what the map indicates, or walls that have been added or removed since the map was drawn.

Selected Answer: B
important steps is to calibrate the floor map dimensions. Proper calibration ensures that:
The survey results (signal strength, interference, coverage areas) align correctly with the real-world environment.
Distances between APs and client devices are measured accurately.
RF propagation is correctly mapped to the floor plan.

choices.A: Show details of the user density.
choices.C: Display details of the desk numbers

questions.question_text: An engineer is working on a wireless refresh for a customer and identified that the existing WLCs have RTU licenses installed. Which two WLC models can reuse the licenses? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Cisco's Right-to-Use (RTU) license model supports the following Wireless LAN Controller (WLC) platforms: 3504 WLC, 5520 WLC, 8540 WLC, and Cisco Catalyst 9800 controller. 
RTU licenses are available for the 8.5 release and later.

Q. What type of license exists on 3504 Wireless LAN Controller?
A. 3504, 5520 and 8540 Wireless LAN Controllers supports two (2) types of licenses:

RTU (Right-To-Use) License
Smart-License

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/wireless/3504-wireless-controller/214106-licensing-on-3504-5520-and-8540-wireles.html#toc-hId-1787190494

RTU licensing is supported only on the following Cisco Wireless Controller platforms:

- Cisco 5520 Wireless Controller
- Cisco Flex 7510 Wireless Controller
- Cisco 8510 Wireless Controller
- Cisco 8540 Wireless Controller
- Cisco vWLC

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/wireless/controller/8-2/config-guide/b_cg82/b_cg82_chapter_0100.html

Users who leave the office with a wireless headset must be able to hand off the voice call with minimal disruption. The engineer drafted four possible floor plans for AP placement:

• red dots and arrows represent the direction of travel
• blue dots represent the AP placements

Which floor plan provides the requested functionality?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Cert Guide page 62

Selected Answer: A
A is the correct, ENWLSD - Cert Guide PG. 59

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

SE-Connect Mode
SE-Connect Mode enables a user to connect Chanalyzer directly to a Cisco CleanAir access point when the access point is not connected to a controller. The access point provides air quality and interference detection reports for all monitored channels.
D is correct one, when you want to do Layer 1 survey and monitor Non wifi channels then we should put AP in SE-Connect mode and connect that to ChannelAnalayzer
